<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Add cascade delete to rollback tables: sys_rollback_run, sys_rollback_conflict and sys_rollback_schema_conflict</description>
        <name>Add cascade delete to rollback_run table</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_rollback_run');
	gr.addQuery('element', 'context');
	gr.addNullQuery('reference_cascade_rule');
	gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.query();
	if (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('reference_cascade_rule', 'delete');
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.update();
	}

  var tables = ["sys_rollback_conflict", "sys_rollback_schema_conflict"];
  for (var i = 0; i < tables.length; i++) {
    var table_name = tables[i];
    gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    gr.addQuery('name', table_name);
    gr.addQuery('element', 'rollback_run');
    gr.addNullQuery('reference_cascade_rule');
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
      gr.setValue('reference_cascade_rule', 'delete');
      gr.setWorkflow(false);
      gr.update();
    }
  }

  return;
  })();]]></script>
